txt.en: Talk to Durin inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld
There is a distant rumbling as the keep shakes beneath your feet
Durin is inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld.

'Even so, I do not think Karazgar's words are without meaning. He will attack Skarháld as he promised, and we will need to repel him. Go to your friend Durin inside the keep and help him assess our equipment. I want to ensure we have weapons and armour enough for my Zhélruka when Karazgar does attack.'
Talk to Durin inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld
DNT - Blah!

'I heard some of the Zhélruka talking, [placeholder]. Is it true that Karazgar has promised three assaults upon Skarháld? This inventory of the supplies has become much more important than it was mere hours ago! Have you come to assist me?\n\n'I would appreciate it if you could tally the weapons and armour contained in the side rooms, and to inspect the siege defences outside the keep. We will need to know what deserves the most attention if we are to prepare in time for Karazgar's return.'
Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, has promised to bring war to Skarháld, and Bótuz Frostblood wants you to ready the defences.
'DNT - Blah!'
DNT - Blah!
The mountains shake again!
'DNT - Blah!'
Talk to Bótuz Frostblood inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld

'I feared it was so, for the siege defences seemed in a poor state, even to my casual eye. Speak to some of the craftsmen here in the keep and see if they can repair the ballistae or produce a greater supply of heavy arrows to be set with them.\n\n'I hold no authority over these dwarves, but I hope they will understand the importance of these suggestions! My teachers impressed upon me the need for suitable preparations; it is much better to mourn the lost time after a victory than it is to mourn a lost battle!'
Made a tally of the weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Blah!
Made a tally of the armour ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'DNT - Blah!'
DNT - Blah!
Assessed defences and found them wanting ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Blah!
'Did you feel that? What is happening?'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
Send Zhélruka craftsmen to repair the siege defences ([placeholder]/4)
'The mountains shake as if caught in a great gale! Has the Weeping Warrior worked some sorcery upon us?'
'What is happening? The very mountains shake beneath my feet!'
The mountains shake!
Durin asked you to count the weapons and armour currently stored inside the keep of Skarháld, as well as to assess the quality of the siege defences on the upper level outside the keep.

'Karazgar is a liar and he cannot be trusted, but on this subject I believe him. He will do as he has promised, and bring battle to the dwarves here at Skarháld. The task I gave to Durin is suddenly important in a fashion I did not expect. Go to your friend inside the keep and see that it is not too much for him! The assessment of our defences is too important now to trust to the son of the Longbeard king!'

'I would appreciate it if you could tally the weapons and armour contained in the side rooms, and to inspect the siege defences outside the keep. We will need to know what deserves the most attention if we are to prepare in time for Karazgar's return.'
Durin is inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld.

'The siege defences appeared to be in a poor state, even to my casual eye. Speak to some of the craftsmen here in the keep and see if they can repair the ballistae or produce more heavy arrows to be loaded within them. They will need to act quickly, for Karazgar is almost certainly on his way!'

'Karazgar will attack Skarháld as he promised, and we will need to repel him. Go to your friend Durin inside the keep and help him assess our equipment. I want to ensure we have weapons and armour enough for my Zhélruka when Karazgar does attack.'
Durin has requested that you send Zhélruka craftsmen inside the keep to repair the siege defences.
'Speak to some of the craftsmen here in the keep and see if they can repair the ballistae or produce a greater supply of heavy arrows to be set with them.'
The mountains shake! What is happening?
Sent craftsmen to repair the siege defences ([placeholder]/4)
Assessed the defences and found them wanting ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Durin is inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld, which has been shaken to its foundations.
Tally the weapons stored inside the keep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The mountains shake! What is happening?
'I'll see what I can do.'
Tally the armour stored inside the keep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I will make my best effort.'
'If anything can be done, I will see to it.'
Bótuz Frostblood is inside the keep of Skarháld.
Assess the quality of the siege defences outside the keep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Count on me for it!'
'I will see it done.'
This time the rumbling is more pronounced, as the keep shakes again
'Worry not! It is as good as done.'
Talk to Durin inside Tharrazhâr, the keep of Skarháld
'I will do what I can.'
Chapter 8.6: Tremors in the Foundation
